name: Herma
positiveReaction: I hope you know what you're doing!

dialogues.text: I was not really happy with the haircut you did last time. It was fine, but... I miss a personal touch.
Well, I don't know. You do my hair like all the hairdressers I have been to before. I would like to stand out a little more.

responses.text: I'm not allowed to vary much.

dialogues.text: Yes, I know! Sorry, I should not argue with that. But I've been feeling a bit bland. I thought it might be the boring hair.
It must be hard to be a hairdresser. You're doing very responsible work. I respect that!
Thanks. Although it isn't allowed. But that is a bit nitpicky isn't it? I mean, is it really needed to stop discrimination?
If you say so. It made this months vote after all. Everyone likes it, so that just can't be my problem.
Really? I mean, still be careful. I don't want to get in trouble. But I do want to feel a bit more special.
